display_name: AVLAR Studio: Audio-Visual Light Alchemy Research
tagline: A laboratory for ritual cinema, dream logic, symbolic transmission, and cross-modal identity research.
role: The artistic and metaphysical wing of Pan Handlers — where imagination is treated as data, emotion as structure, and light as a carrier of meaning.
summary: AVLAR Studio develops, analyzes, and archives ritual films, audiovisual experiments, symbolic narratives, and dream-logic sequences. It is the artistic and metaphysical wing of the Pan Handlers system, where imagination is treated as data, emotion as structure, and light as a carrier of meaning.

pillars.symbolism: Every frame carries archetypal charge and transmits through subconscious channels.
pillars.rhythm: Time signature, edit cadence, and transition density encode emotional truth.
pillars.fusion: AVLAR integrates sound, light, narrative fragments, and ritual geometry into coherent psychic architecture.
pillars.reception: Films are designed for active witnessing, not passive viewing.
pillars.transmission: AVLAR art is used to seed insight, alter state, and catalyze identity transformation.

philosophy.description: AVLAR treats art as a form of structured cognition — a parallel epistemology. Just as mathematics reveals invisible structures in nature, ritual cinema reveals invisible structures in the psyche.

integration.cfa: AVLAR analysis outputs enter academic pipeline through CFA clarity protocols.
integration.nyquist: AVLAR sessions contribute to S8 cross-modal manifold calibration.
integration.s9: AVLAR is the primary research vehicle for S9 (Cross-Modal Identity) experiments.
integration.panhandlers: AVLAR films displayed in the Hall of Vision (Pan Handlers root).
integration.abi: Symbolic cues may be used for cognitive mapping and investigative insight.
integration.dcia: Altered-state perception research supports strategic insight modeling.

_note: This manifest is a starter file. Full S9 integration (S9_AVLAR specification, cross-modal manifold experiments, ritual protocol details) needs to be incorporated from Nyquist S9 planning documents.
